transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Kahan se bol rahe ho?
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha sir main IndiaMART se senior manager, kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Sir baad mein karenge abhi main shadi mein thoda busy hun, theek hai? Achha do teen din mein, haan do char panch din baad karenge bas.
Executive: Bas ek confirmation chahiye tha sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Main keh raha sir koi issue nahi hai main char panch din baad aapko laga lunga uske according, but ek sir complain aapka aaya hua tha sir bylead quality ko leke sir, to agar aap allow karo to, haan boliye.
Customer: Haan bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Agar aap allow karo to main is concern ko abhi close kar sakta hun sir, baki aap mujhe time bata dijiye uske according main aapko laga lunga sir.
Executive: Jaise aaj 20 tarikh hai to aap jab free ho jayenge uske according hum ek bar baat kar lenge sari cheeze ki kya aapka.
Customer: Bilkul kar lenge sir us time hi karenge, bylead to waise bhi nahi aa rahi aapki bahut hi ghatiya service hai bhaiya kya bataun main.
Customer: Jis hisab se paise diye the sala jab tumhare target rehte hain jab tum sala mast bhav dete ho aur jab sala matlab kuch aadmi ko matlab ab tumhare target khatam ho gaye tum mast free ho ek bhi call nahi aaya IndiaMART se abhi tak.
Customer: Teen mahine baad pehla call aaya hai ye, beech mein Anshita ne call kiya tha char panch din pehle ki baat hai bas.
Executive: Hmm hmm, Anshika ne kal bhi aapko call kiya tha sir kal bhi.
Customer: Haan to wahi keh raha hun na teen char din se hi call aa rahe hain, wo to jab call aa rahe hain na jab mail dalo jab call aate hain.
Customer: Pure saal mein kya kuch bhi nahi padi rehti bhaiya aap logo ko?
Executive: Sir October mahine mein aapke paas agar main day wise dekhe sir hamare paas sari cheeze over the recorded rehta hai sir aap ek bar.
Customer: Are to usko bylead wo dekho to sahi bhai mere paas 7000, 6000 square feet ki quantity wale bylead dikh hi nahi rahi hai na IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Theek hai quantity wale ka issue hai agar hamare paas available hoge to definitely aapko dikhegi sir kyunki aap agar keh rahe ho na ki service se related agar call nahi gayi hai to 24 October ko bhi aapko Anshika se baat hua tha sir uske baad 28 October ko bhi Anshika ne aapse lagaya tha even 30 October ko bhi lagaya tha sir kal bhi aapko.
Customer: Mere bhaiya pehle pehle pehle kya tha na aapke system mein tha 5 lakh ke above wali quantity apne aap aati thi.
Customer: Aapke system mein ab kya hai wo 5 lakh wali quantity hata rakhi hai aap logo ne.
Executive: Nahi Udbhav sir aisa nahi hai ki sir hum koi quantity yahan se sir hata denge.
Customer: Are hatai hai na mere bhai mere ko pata hai na main bata raha hun na tumhe wo order value aati hai yahan pe IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan to wo 5 lakh ke upar ki option aata tha pehle ab wo option tumne hata diya hai wahan se.
Executive: Abhi humne customize kar diya hai sir aap amount wise likh bhi check kar sakte ho sir agar aapko 5 lakh ka chahiye aap 5 lakh wahan pe mention kar sakte ho sir amount wise khud se aap customize dal sakte ho sir bylead section pe aap jahan pe jate ho na.
Customer: Are but wo wali quality nahi aa rahi hai na bhaiya ab kya bolun main aapko yaar waise hi ladaiya chalti hai is chakkar mein sala jabardasti wo partner ab wo mere ko bolte hain mere partner ki yaar aap tum jabardasti paise de diye wo wale itne badhiya to hamare hi kam chal rahe hain na bhaiya vyavahar se jo hamare paas order aate hain wahi supply karenge hum IndiaMART walon ko.
Executive: Wo to sir aapka sir shuru se hi chal raha hai sir IndiaMART mein aapne liya hai sir to pehle aapne annual liya tha sir.
Customer: To ye ye kharcha nikalna chahiye na IndiaMART se liya hai agar maine 75-80 hazar jo bhi diye hain mere to ye nikalne chahiye na bhai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm bilkul bilkul sir bilkul invest kara hai to sir business to chahiye hoga sir.
Customer: Haan aur jabardasti thodi main jeb se deta rahunga bhai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Wahi suniye, Udbhav sir waise aap free kab ho jayiyega aap mujhe bataiye sir.
Customer: Main karta hun aapko 22, 23 ya 25 ke baad kabhi bhi kar lena aap.
Executive: 25 ke baad na to main ek kam karta hun sir na ki Wednesday ko sir 26 tarikh pad raha hai theek hai sir next.
Customer: Haan tab call kar lijiyega haan.
Executive: Haan to main aapko reminder dal dijiye jab apan baat kar lenge ek bar.
Executive: Haan main Wednesday ko aapko laga lunga sir us din ek bar hum baat kar lete hain possible hoga to video meeting mein bhi connect kar lete hain.
Customer: Bilkul 100% koi issue nahi hai bilkul theek hai.
Executive: Baki agar aapka permission ho sir to jo complain hum aapne raise kiya usko main abhi close kar sakta hun sir.
Customer: Ab close to karoge hi yaar tumhare paas option kya hai bhai uska.
Executive: Haan main to close kar raha hun.
Customer: Karna ho koi dikkat nahi but ab iska mere ko wo chahiye solution chahiye iska koi bhi.
Executive: Sir definitely isiliye to maine aapko bulaya na ek bar main bhi check kar lunga sir agar kuch category wagera correction karna hoga sir.
Executive: To wo bhi hum karenge sir ki kahan pe issue aa raha hai sir hai na.
Customer: Baki ek bar hum bylead bhi check kar lenge hai na sir.
Executive: Haan theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Chaliye hum
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about poor buylead quality.

- States that the 5 lakh+ quantity filter is missing.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART's service.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the category correction.

- Executive offered to schedule a call on Wednesday.

- Executive offered a video meeting if possible.

- Executive closed the complaint with customer's permission.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer on Wednesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, service, quantity, complaints
